official_title: A bill to make scholarships available to provide clinical psychologists to provide services to Indians.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to make clinical psychologists eligible for Indian Health Scholarships.

titles.title: A bill to make scholarships available to provide clinical psychologists to provide services to Indians.
